title: T-Systems Launches PLM Cloud Platform Powered by Aras
text:
T-Systems Launches PLM Cloud Platform Powered by Aras
T-Systems SaaS PLM Offering Provides Full Aras Functionality with Customization Capabilities and End-to-End Services
Andover, MA, October 21, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Aras®, the next leader in enterprise Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software, and T-Systems, a global provider of information and communication technology for multinational corporations and public sector institutions, today announced the launch of the new T-Systems PLM Cloud Platform powered by Aras Innovator®. Delivered as Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), the T-Systems PLM Cloud Platform combines end-to-end services with full Aras Innovator functionality, customization and integration capabilities.
Learn more and run the T-Systems PLM Cloud Platform: https://servicenet.t-systems.com/t-systems-plm-en/aras-cloud/1373646
Running on secure, high performance and dynamic infrastructure in the modern T-Systems cloud data centers, the T-Systems PLM Cloud Platform provides global companies with a complete enterprise PLM solution that includes application management services for service desk, data security, monitoring, reporting and more.
T-Systems PLM Cloud Platform Advantages
· Predefined for large enterprises, midsized companies and small businesses
· Private cloud and hybrid deployment options
· Full customization capabilities
· Upgradable even when customized
· Open integration and data federation capabilities
· PDMWebConnector for integration to Enovia, Teamcenter, Windchill and others
· PDMWorkbench integrations to CATIA and NX
“We’re excited that T-Systems has selected Aras as the PLM backbone for their new PLM Cloud Platform,” said Peter Schroer, CEO of Aras. “By partnering with T-Systems on this SaaS offering, we are able to deliver a complete cloud solution that provides all the power Aras Innovator offers, together with integrated services and expert support.”
About T-Systems
Drawing on a global infrastructure of data centers and networks, T-Systems operates information and communication technology (ICT) systems for multinational corporations and public sector institutions. As Deutsche Telekom’s corporate customer arm, T-Systems provides integrated solutions for the networked future of business and society. T-Systems combines industry expertise with ICT innovations to add significant value to customers’ core business all over the world. With approximately 47,800 employees worldwide, T-Systems generated revenue of around EUR 8,6 billion in the 2014 financial year. www.t-systems.com
About Aras
We offer the best Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software for global businesses with complex products and processes. Advanced PLM platform technology makes Aras more scalable, flexible and secure for the world’s largest organizations, and a full set of applications provide complete functionality for companies of all sizes. Customers include GE, GETRAG, Hitachi, Honda, Motorola, Textron and XEROX. Aras is privately held with global headquarters in Andover, Mass. More at www.aras.com and Twitter @aras_plm
